description: Query the list of possible confirmation email addresses.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Product type; only relevant if no SSL certificate ID is provided
ID of an existing SSL certificate order; if provided the actual confirmation email address of this SSL certificate order will be returned
Domain name for which the SSL certificate would be ordered; only relevant if no SSL certificate ID is provided
Certificate signing request (CSR) in base64 encoding line by line; only relevant if no SSL certificate ID and no domain are provided
